content.heading: The Aufguss Ritual
content.subheading: A transformative German sauna ceremony that elevates heat into healing through aromatherapy, music, and the masterful art of towel waving.
content.description: In the hands of a skilled Aufguss Master, every element becomes intentional. From the selection of essential oils to the rhythm of the towel work, each session is a carefully choreographed experience designed to guide you through waves of sensation and renewal.

content.heading: Enter the Ritual
content.subheading: Where ancient wellness meets modern life. Amanda Berger guides transformative experiences through sauna, breathwork, and sound.
content.description: At Bathhouse Studio, we create sacred space for the modern world. Through carefully curated rituals rooted in ancient traditions, we offer a sanctuary for transformation, healing, and community.

content.heading: Sacred Space for Modern Life
content.description: Bathhouse Studio is more than a wellness spaceâ€”it's a sanctuary for transformation. Through carefully curated rituals rooted in ancient traditions, we create experiences that honor both individual healing and community connection.
content.mission: Our mission is to make profound wellness practices accessible, authentic, and transformative for modern life.

content.heading: Wellness Experiences
content.subheading: From traditional sauna rituals to guided breathwork, each experience is designed to restore, reset, and reconnect.

content.heading: Join Our Community
content.description: Connect with like-minded individuals on a journey of wellness and self-discovery. Our community values authentic connection, mutual support, and shared growth.
content.newsletter_description: Receive early access to events, wellness tips, and Amanda's reflections on ritual and community.

content.heading: Connect With Us
content.description: Ready to begin your wellness journey? Have questions about our offerings? We're here to guide you.
